text: The 9/11 WTC/Pentagon Attack and the Illuminati One World Order indication was made apparent within the “external world,” the GA’s information provided since September 2000 and brieﬂy summarized in the original “2001 Update” section of this book, revealed that contemporary Earth is caught within a long-anticipated, “presently hidden” inter- dimensional, Interstellar War.
